text: Bruce Paul Abbott (born July 28, 1954 in Portland, Oregon) is an American actor. He was in movies such as Re-Animator, Bad Dreams, The Prophecy II, Out of Time, Bride of Re-Animator and the television series Dark Justice. ==References== == Other websites == * Category:1954 births Category:Living people Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:American dancers Category:American movie directors Category:American movie producers Category:American stage actors Category:American television directors Category:American television producers Category:Actors from Portland, Oregon
title: Bruce Abbott
